programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: Desperate townspeople hire seven mercenaries to battle a greedy industrialist and his ruthless henchmen in the Old West.

programme.title: A Perfect Murder

programme.title: Self Reliance
programme.desc: Given the opportunity to participate in a life or death reality game show, one man discovers there's a lot to live for.

programme.title: Clear History
programme.desc: After an argument with his boss, Nathan changes his identity to escape public humiliation – only to find his past disrupting his new life.

programme.title: The Sympathizer S1
programme.desc: With the fall of Saigon imminent, the Captain juggles the communist party, the South Vietnamese army, his CIA handler, and his conscience.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Three aspiring performers discover that the path to superstardom is strewn with obstacles and difficult decisions. Stars Jamie Foxx and Beyonce Knowles

programme.title: Rock And A Hard Place
programme.desc: Incarcerated young people enter the famed Miami-Dade County Corrections & Rehabilitation Boot Camp Program in search of a second chance.

programme.title: Reality
programme.desc: On June 3, 2017, 25-year-old former American intelligence specialist Reality Winner is confronted by FBI agents arriving at her home to question her suspected role in the mishandling of classified information. Based on true events, the film’s dialogue is directly from the transcript of their tense and transfixing conversation.

programme.title: First Man
programme.desc: A riveting story behind the first manned mission to the moon, focusing on Neil Armstrong and the decade leading to the historic Apollo 11 flight.

programme.title: The Late Shift

Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

A very distracted Beans makes Tag’s task even harder. / When pup-star Kelly Korgi announces a contest where she’ll pick her favorite Roadside Attraction to star in her new music video, Tag and Scooch are excited to enter Pawston. programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: Tag's scooter breaks down during a Race Cadet challenge to deliver boxes of Sam Whippet’s Chocolate Chippet’s the fastest. So Tag and Scooch must rely on other ways of getting around town. / Muttfield the Magnificent is set to perform a magic show at Yip’s birthday party! Until he accidentally makes himself disappear. Muttfield instructs Tag and Scooch to retrieve three magical items to make him appear again. But can they do it in time?

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Donna decides to show off her not-so-flashy skills as a magician at the Community Center talent show, the Zenkos must do everything they can to save her act from becoming an embarrassing disaster. / After Sam’s favorite skateboard accidentally gets put in with donations Mr. Tanaka is collecting for a fundraiser, the team is led on a merry chase as the skateboard passes from one Harmony Harbor denizen to another.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: Little Lula has set up a lemonade stand, but she’s not getting any business. The Zenkos swing into action to send customers her way. / When Donna, Fawna and Rona have a spat, the triplets’ longstanding annual tradition of viewing a comet together is in jeopardy. Now it’s up to Team Zenko to get the three feuding sisters back together again before the comet streaks by.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders

programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Mrs Goggins is on holiday, so Sarah Gilbertson is looking after her dog Bonnie. She calls in on Pat and proves she has zero control over the dog. But there is only time for Jess to roll his eyes before Pat is called out on a special delivery - it's urgent! He has to deliver the RADARSCOPE (designed by Ted) to Mrs Goggins, who is up in Scotland! Pat has no idea what a radarscope is and neither does Ben. But they know what urgent means, so they spring into action and load it into Pat's jet plane. Back in Greendale Bonnie gives Sarah the slip, and PC Selby becomes embroiled in an escalating search... up in Scotland meanwhile, Pat lands but doesn't even get an explanation of the radarscope as time is pressing, and he, Jess, and their technological bit of kit are bundled into a boat and they set out over the loch... Loch Ness! While the search for mischievous Bonnie intensifies back home, Pat realizes they are searching for a creature of their own - the Loch Ness Monster!

programme.desc: A psychopath falsifies everything about his cruel past to marry his wife. However, his secrets are soon revealed after his wife, a detective, doubts him as a suspect of a murder case.

programme.desc: A psychopath falsifies everything about his cruel past to marry his wife. However, his secrets are soon revealed after his wife, a detective, doubts him as a suspect of a murder case.

programme.title: Street Woman Fighter 2
programme.desc: The legendary dance series is back! In this all-female dance survival program, the 8 female dance crews compete to be the No. 1 team. Shownu and Monika will join as judges.

programme.title: Missing: The Other Side 2
programme.desc: Continuing the story of its first season, Kim Wook and Jang Pan-seok will try to find the bodies of missing people and chase after the truth behind their deaths in another village of dead spirits.

programme.title: The Ways of Tasting
programme.desc: A special program showcasing actresses Lee Ji-ah and Kim Go-eun's trip to famous restaurants and bars in Seoul and Taiwan, pairing whiskey with food.

programme.title: The Soul-Mate
programme.desc: A Judo instructor's life turned upside down when he becomes haunted by a ghost of a police officer who is stuck in a coma after an accident while investigating a case

programme.title: Andron
programme.desc: A group of people are plunged into a dark, claustrophobic maze, where they must fight to survive, as the outside world watches.

programme.title: Midnight
programme.desc: A serial killer ruthlessly hunts down a deaf woman through the streets of South Korea after she witnesses his brutal crime.

programme.title: Escape From Mogadishu
programme.desc: Diplomats from North and South Korea get trapped as war rages in Mogadishu, Somalia. With no aid from either government, they must unite with their enemies to survive.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: A railroad worker in China in 1941 leads a team of freedom fighters against the Japanese in order to get food for the poor.

programme.title: Thick As Thieves
programme.desc: On loan from Chicago mafia to Detroit underworld, a thief gets double-crossed by the Detroit boss, and, after barely escaping, vows to take revenge

programme.title: Men Of Plastic
programme.desc: A business minded networker partnered with unlicensed but talented surgeon to open a whole new primetime of Apgujeong.

programme.title: Tiger Cage 2
programme.desc: Gangsters pursue a Hong Kong lawman framed for murder and a lawyer they believe is linked to laundered money.

programme.title: Hellboy: Rise Of The Blood Queen
programme.desc: Hellboy, a supernatural being, protects the earth with the Bureau of Paranormal Research and Defense. Soon, he faces the blood queen, an ancient witch who wants to bring about the end of the world

programme.title: Remember
programme.desc: The story of Pil-Joo, an Alzheimer's patient in his 80s, who lost all his family during the Japanese colonial era, and devotes his lifelong revenge before his memories disappear, and a young man in his 20s who helps him.

programme.title: No Mercy
programme.desc: A former champion martial artist struggles to find and seeks revenge on those responsible for her sister's disappearance.

programme.title: Prison On Fire
programme.desc: Inside a Chinese prison two inmates form a friendship and face the difficulty of life on the inside.

programme.title: Beautiful Disaster
programme.desc: College freshman Abby tries to distance herself from her dark past while resisting her attraction to bad boy Travis.

programme.title: Harrison Ford: Hollywood Hero
programme.desc: Everyone thinks they know Harrison Ford. They know the adventurous Nazi-fighting archaeologist and the Blade Runner from a dystopian future. But nobody really knows the man behind the movies once the cameras have stopped rolling.

programme.title: The Lost Tapes
programme.desc: After the acquittal of four Los Angeles police officers who beat African American Rodney King, the city erupted into chaos. Take a real-time look at the turmoil that led to 54 deaths, nearly 12,000 arrests, and over $1 billion in damages.

programme.title: The Lost Tapes
programme.desc: From heiress of a giant media empire to wanted felon, witness the strange saga of the Patty Hearst kidnapping of 1974.

programme.title: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe
programme.desc: This episode explores the young Norma Jeane. While showing talent and audacity, she turned her back on her difficult childhood and put herself on the radar in Hollywood as ‘Marilyn Monroe’.

programme.title: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe
programme.desc: This episode explores Marilyn’s defiance about posing nude and how it catapults her to stardom.

programme.title: Dinosaur Cold Case
programme.desc: It's called Borealopelta, a recently discovered, 110 million year old dinosaur that's so well preserved, it looks like it could've been walking the Earth just last month. Now, paleontologists at Canada's Royal Tyrrell Museum have taken on the roles of forensic detectives to determine where it came from, how it died, and why this land based creature wound up in an area that was once an inland sea.

programme.title: Courage The Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: After a rainstorm, a puddle queen materializes at the farm. She woos Eustace and drags him down into her puddle world. Muriel is heartbroken, of course, so Courage must save Eustace.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play kite-surf with a homemade kite. Grizzy notices that the she-bear he's in love with watches the kite perform arabesques in the sky with admiration. He decides to make a kite that is far more sophisticated than the Lemmings' kite.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings try to catch a bat to play rodeo, disturbing Grizzy as he plays his favorite game on the ranger's mobile. But when the phone is hit and its alarm activated, a submarine sonar sound is emitted. When the bat hears it, it seems to become docile.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drives Mrs Wicket to the hospital for a minor operation, but gets bored waiting and goes for a wander…

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
programme.desc: Anais arrives in the bedroom to find a messy crime-scene and her Daisy doll missing. She realises that Gumball and Darwin are the chief suspects. Following a series of clues is her only chance to track them down, and her only hope of learning what happened to Daisy. But as the mystery unravels, it seems the culprits may have turned on each other.

programme.title: Beast Boy: Lone Wolf
programme.desc: Following on from the previous episode, Beast Boy is well and truly under the control of the leader of the rat gang! Helping him and his rats clear out the San Pèrez art Museum of their entire collection of rare jewels.

programme.title: Beast Boy: Lone Wolf
programme.desc: It's laundry day! And our independent hero is standing in his underwear waiting for his clothes to wash when he's suddenly teleported into a mysterious cave and comes face to face with the Black Witch and her Black Cat.

programme.title: Beast Boy: Lone Wolf
programme.desc: Beast Boy and the Giant Elephant Man smash into the local LexMart superstore during the shift of Teen-Titan-super-fan, Mickie. Mickie and her manager inform Beast Boy that even though he's a superhero “you break it, you buy it”.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Beast Boy gets fired from the team and the Wonder Twins take his place.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Beast Boy persuades the other Titans into becoming vegetarians, but some of the converts take their new dietary restrictions a little too seriously.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls
programme.desc: When the Girls disobey the Professor and swing all the way over the swing set, they must deal with unexpected consequences.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: After an encounter with a Hug Wolf, Finn goes through a Jekyll and Hyde-like transformation becoming a hug-wolf himself!

programme.title: Ben 10
programme.desc: While winning big on a Sumo Slammers video game, Ben gets the idea to win a real wrestling match - until an intimidating wrestler named Iron Kyle decides to make it a true challenge.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings: World Tour

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: One of the Knights has tried a magic spell but it went wrong and he's shrunk! Queen Sparklewings could help him but she's hiding and won't come out. It's up to Noddy to investigate and work out why the Queen is hiding and how to persuade her to help the Knight grow again. With the help of his wwwbook Noddy discovers that the Queen has got felt pen on her face and is too shy to be seen! Once Noddy shows her how to remove the felt pen the Queen stops hiding and the Knight can return to the right size. Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Bumble's sneezing has got so bad, it is keeping everyone awake at night. Webby gives Fifi a recipe for a cure for sneezes… will it work?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and the team have one last attempt to get the pendant, but they will have to disrupt Jayesh's wedding, and contend with his guards, to do so. At the mage island, Klaus and Veruca get hold of the Tianshang helmet.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When Grandma Templeton comes to stay, she forces Boss Baby into Tim's room but they struggle to be roommates, and meanwhile, Baby Corp's new CEO trusts Boss Baby with the new Stinkless Serum

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: When the town’s well runs dry, Hiccup and Toothless discover a group of baby Whispering Death dragons living in the tunnels underneath, planted there by Alvin.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When there is an imposter in Troll Village, Branch and Poppy embark on a man-hunt as to try to keep the Trolls from realizing that anything is off/Poppy discovers that Archer Pastry belongs to a group of evil creatures called the Party Crashers

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp is swept by an ocean current to the shore of Unicorn Land where he sees a majestic creature on a cliff that looks just like him, but not like his Narwhal family under the sea. Kelp tells his family he’s a unicorn. / Kelp returns to Unicorn Land where he meets Pixie and Juniper, who show him around and introduce him to unicorn spark and magic.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Kelp is introduced to crunchy tacos in Unicorn Land, he must use his bubble sparks to bring them back to his family underwater. / Kelp’s unicorn friends are going to teach him Swishbee on land. But it rains and the game is called off until Kelp shows them that playing in the water can be even more fun.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: When Sam Whippet asks Tag to help fill every seat in the Speedway for his big race, Tag zips around Pawston seeking out dogs. But it won’t be easy, as it happens to be a very busy day in town. A very distracted Beans makes Tag’s task even harder. / When pup-star Kelly Korgi announces a contest where she’ll pick her favorite Roadside Attraction to star in her new music video, Tag and Scooch are excited to enter Pawston. Now they just have to build one. And they have to do it fast.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: Tag's scooter breaks down during a Race Cadet challenge to deliver boxes of Sam Whippet’s Chocolate Chippet’s the fastest. So Tag and Scooch must rely on other ways of getting around town. / Muttfield the Magnificent is set to perform a magic show at Yip’s birthday party! Until he accidentally makes himself disappear. Muttfield instructs Tag and Scooch to retrieve three magical items to make him appear again. But can they do it in time?

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Donna decides to show off her not-so-flashy skills as a magician at the Community Center talent show, the Zenkos must do everything they can to save her act from becoming an embarrassing disaster. / After Sam’s favorite skateboard accidentally gets put in with donations Mr. Tanaka is collecting for a fundraiser, the team is led on a merry chase as the skateboard passes from one Harmony Harbor denizen to another.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: Little Lula has set up a lemonade stand, but she’s not getting any business. The Zenkos swing into action to send customers her way. / When Donna, Fawna and Rona have a spat, the triplets’ longstanding annual tradition of viewing a comet together is in jeopardy. Now it’s up to Team Zenko to get the three feuding sisters back together again before the comet streaks by.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, they’re invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove they're kind and helpful.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Dak's lack of planning gets him, Cutter and Winger lost with Elbone in the Maze Caves, and Leyla's overthinking threatens the effort to rescue them.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.desc: When Kid Pickles is feeling down on his birthday, Puss and Artephius create a magical scroll that names Kid Pickles as heir to the San Lorenzo throne.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: After pirates invade San Lorenzo searching for mystical treasure, Puss leads them on the hunt, hoping his share will defend against the Bloodwolf

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: When Al goes out of town, he puts the PALs in charge of the ramada, but they get more than they bargained for when three trouble-making horses escape

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free

programme.desc: When Cooper loses Guy Diamond in Troll Forest, Poppy and Branch accompany him as he retraces his steps /Poppy sets out to recreate the recipe of Branch's favorite dessert at any cost

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Pixie struggles to recreate an old tradition perfectly, the kids realize they can make their own traditions./ A story told by Chef J inspires Juniper to go in search of snow.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag tries to prove to Mom that she’s a big dog by puppysitting Yip and Rhonda all day. programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Ian starts to sleepwalk around Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly guides him back to his own bed where he can continue sleeping safely. / When Felicia wants to run an obstacle course for the first time but is afraid she’ll embarrass herself, TZG secretly boosts her confidence by helping with practice.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po and the Kids finally arrive in the Forbidden City. After an assassination scare, Xiao enlists Po and the 4Cs for help protecting her during her father's funeral.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: When Meatlug accidentally ingests magnetic rocks, she becomes magnetic herself – causing destruction through the town, but ultimately helping the kids win a battle against the Outcasts.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: The kids go on a training mission on Dragon Island, where Hiccup runs into an old enemy – Dagur!

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. programme.desc: When Tip is too busy to hang, Oh steals and befriends a squid from the city aquarium; The B. O. Boys attempt to tear Tip and Oh apart.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: White Shadow quits racing and it's up to Turbo to convince him to get back on the track.//The crew becomes detectives and meets a strange new creature.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: When D-Structs tricks the Gluphosaurs into attacking the Dinotrux, Revvit must befriend them and find a way to “unstick” the crew from one another.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Whitebeard uses the Grow Key to make himself 40' tall. But the key breaks! So the Wanderers take the key to Wizard Fix-It in Moscow. While fixing the key, Fix-It accidentally makes Waldo, Wenda and herself two inches tall! So begins a Nutcracker-like mini-adventure in Moscow to retrieve the key from Odlulu and Fritz.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Mrs Goggins is on holiday, so Sarah Gilbertson is looking after her dog Bonnie. She calls in on Pat and proves she has zero control over the dog. But there is only time for Jess to roll his eyes before Pat is called out on a special delivery - it's urgent! He has to deliver the RADARSCOPE (designed by Ted) to Mrs Goggins, who is up in Scotland! Pat has no idea what a radarscope is and neither does Ben. But they know what urgent means, so they spring into action and load it into Pat's jet plane. Back in Greendale Bonnie gives Sarah the slip, and PC Selby becomes embroiled in an escalating search... up in Scotland meanwhile, Pat lands but doesn't even get an explanation of the radarscope as time is pressing, and he, Jess, and their technological bit of kit are bundled into a boat and they set out over the loch... Loch Ness! While the search for mischievous Bonnie intensifies back home, Pat realizes they are searching for a creature of their own - the Loch Ness Monster!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa and Crocky inadvertently leave one of the others out of all their games. Will they realise that sometimes games can be more fun the more players you have?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: There's a mystery in Toyland! All the toys have drawn pictures of Deltoid but they've all been scribbled on and ruined! Noddy opens the investigation to find out who is the mystery artist. Using his wwwbook to follow the clues, Noddy realises that it's Deltoid who was drawing on all the pictures because he didn't think any of them look like him! Noddy suggests that they draw pictures again – and this time Deltoid can draw his own picture too. Clever Noddy's saved the day!

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.desc: Price was never a concern for Dali, who was born rich. However, in an overnight, she is left with nothing due to her father's sudden death and bankruptcy. In front of Dali, who is struggling to save the museum that her father wanted to protect until the end, a man shows up, demanding her to pay off a debt of $2,000,000. And that man is Muhak, whom she mistakenly believed to be a big hand in the art world while she was working as a researcher in the Netherlands.

programme.title: Bangkok Storm
programme.desc: Underground boxer Lin Feng is hunted by the Bangkok triad when he refuses to fight in an illegal match. He escaped successfully but lost his memory. While Feng begins a new life, the triad finds him and hires a top boxer to beat him. As Feng suddenly regains his memory in the process, he vows to take down the triad.

programme.title: Totally Outnumbered
programme.desc: Totally Outnumbered is a unique Japanese variety game show where one supreme professional from a specific area of expertise faces off with a large group of amateurs in original competitions in each episode.

programme.title: Iron Squad 2
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean military survival show brings eight Special Force units together to compete in extreme missions that will test their physical stamina, mental strength and teamwork. programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: CSI S3 E05 - Abra Cadaver
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.desc: Dive into the breathtaking world of the fashion photography to discover behind-the-scenes atmosphere and enjoy the most beautiful masterpieces of the iconic photographers and their muses

programme.title: Top Photoshoots
programme.desc: Dive into the breathtaking world of the fashion photography to discover behind-the-scenes atmosphere and enjoy the most beautiful masterpieces of the iconic photographers and their muses

programme.title: Sana Bukas Pa Ang Kahapon (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Three friends made their way in the big city. In the end they all thought of the things they should never have done, wondering what might have been had these tomorrows been their yesterdays.

programme.title: Anak ni Baby Ama (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Baby Ama was a notorious hoodlum sent to the electric chair during the 60's. This movie is a fictionalized account of what life might have been for his son who came to this world already burdened with the memory of his father's life and death.

programme.title: Basagulero
programme.desc: Berto Banal (Ronnie Ricketts) is a hoodlum with a conscience. He can't abide taking advantage of other poor people yet he has no qualms on robbing a usurer.

programme.title: Minsan Pa (Kahit Konting Pagtingin Part 2) (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The sequel to the first blockbuster team-up of FPJ and Sharon Cuneta in "Kahit Konting Pagtingin". This time around, their roles were reversed. Now that they had been given a second chance, they became determined to find out.

programme.title: Wooly Booly 2 (Ang Titser Kong Alien)
programme.desc: The sequel to the succesful Wooly Booly, Ang Classmate Kong Alien. The story continues with Wooly Booly living happily on earth with his human girlfriend. One day, his girlfriend from his planet decides to visit earth with the aim of taking Wooly Booly back home.

programme.title: Swindler's List
programme.desc: Leo and Niño were the swindlers in this wacky tale. But only because of a very good reason: to provide a home for the orphanage. The duo decided to raise money by swindling the rich to give to the poor.

programme.title: Bagets 2 (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The Bagets were back bringing with them their new friends for merrier and wackier adventures. This time around, the boys went to the province for their vacation and found loads to laugh about, cry about, be scared about, be sick about, just about everything you could think of.

programme.title: Bangers
programme.desc: Lolo Hop and his grandsons, Hip and Hap, went to the big city to investigate the mysterious death of their brother, Hep. Lolo Hop, Hip and Hap had no idea of what they were getting into but the result was incredibly hilarious.

programme.title: I Love You Sabado
programme.desc: Heaven makes mistakes too. Janno was killed before his time and must be sent back to earth. However, the Chief Angel found out that he was due to die in one week's time, or next Saturday or Sabado and he would go to hell.

programme.title: Blondie
programme.desc: Lorna (Ilonah Jean) and her friends are gripped in fear as a serial killer is on the loose. But a pattern soon emerges. The victims are all men and a girl in blood wig is seen fleeing the scene of the crime.

programme.title: Laging Umaga
programme.desc: Teresa (Gina Pareño) is pregnant by her rich boyfriend Edwin (George Estregan). But Edwin is sent away to manage their provincial plant by his father (Don Lauro) to stop the impending unsuitable match. Father and son agree that if after two years and Edwin is still in love with Teresa, Don Lauro will no longer oppose the marriage.

programme.title: Work and Play
programme.desc: When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: Pottery
programme.desc: Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Paper Aeroplanes
programme.desc: Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing – because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Edmond Elephant's Birthday
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: A Present for Ron
programme.desc: Christopher loves Ron's rock collection so much, he wants to add another beautiful rock to it! They set off on a journey to find the most amazing rock they can find. When they discover it - they must figure out a creative solution to get it to Ron!

programme.title: Trip to the Moon
programme.desc: Christopher dreams to visit the moon so his friends make his wish come true. Bubu makes a rocket ship in cardboard and the friends make Christopher an outfit with everything he will need during the trip to the moon.

programme.title: Ice Cream / Pasta & Sauce
programme.desc: When Bonzo doesn't get any of Chef's homemade ice cream, Chef tries to make more with his hand-crank ice cream maker. // Chef and Olly just made fresh pasta, so they make Brody Bambino's slow-roasted sauce to go with it - emphasis on the slow!

programme.title: Potato Skins
programme.desc: It's Potato Day, Henry's favorite holiday! Chef wants to whip up Henry's favorite potato dish - except Henry can't remember what it's called!

programme.title: Ninja Blaze
programme.desc: Ninja Master Blackbelt is training Blaze and AJ to be powerful ninjas when Crusher and Pickle accidentally launch themselves onto an icy mountain! Now Blaze and AJ must use their new ninjas skills to rescue them.

programme.title: Mail Truck Blaze
programme.desc: When three big mail deliveries are needed around the world, there's only one monster machine who can deliver it all: Mail Truck Blaze! He'll swim across seas, climb mountains, and venture to the Monster Dome --because mail trucks ALWAYS deliver!

programme.desc: Julius and Julia get into a sticky situation.

programme.title: Pups Save the Big Book Delivery

programme.title: Pups Save the Cat Show
programme.desc: Katie's kittens are all covered in mud and running amuck! If they're not rounded up, the Cat Show will be ruined

programme.title: The Crew Builds Charger A Super Bed / The Crew Builds A Super Squirrely Whirly Playground
programme.desc: Charger has a problem... he's got too much energy to sleep! Lucky for him, Rubble & Crew knows there's always a construction solution. // Rubble and the pups build Mix, Motor, Lucas, and Lily the coolest Super Squirrely Whirly playdate ever!

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Smoothie Shop / The Crew Builds A Dino Roof Party
programme.desc: Café Carl opens up a smoothie shop on the boardwalk! But when the coaster causes coconut chaos, Rubble & Crew know just what to do. // Rubble & Crew work together to find a construction solution when Charger's bouncy birthday surprise needs a lift!

programme.title: Tiny Dancer / The Sleepy Sun
programme.desc: Dora shows the twins a music box with a baila folklorico dancer who comes to life! Bailarina's adelita boots run away, so we need to get them back. // The sun won't set because it can't fall asleep! Dora needs to find Pillow Cloud so Sol can set.

programme.title: The Lucky Necklace / Vigo's Surprise
programme.desc: Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else. // Super Shark and Captain Kelp spot Vigo doing errands around town and are convinced he's hatching a sinister plot.

programme.title: The Great Shark Hunter
programme.desc: Max needs to find more and more fishsticks to keep Sharkdog fed, but his search leads him right into the path of the increasingly suspicious Captain Barb Quigley.

programme.title: Sharks, Sharks, Sharks
programme.desc: Max and Dad are excited to continue their tradition of watching a sharks TV special together, but this year Sharkdog wants to be included.

programme.title: Sharkdog Home Alone
programme.desc: When the Fishers go to the movies, Sharkdog is left home alone for the first time.

programme.title: The Biggest Muddy Puddle in the World
programme.desc: Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Potato City
programme.desc: Peppa and her family visit a new theme park that has a vegetable theme.

programme.title: The New House
programme.desc: Peppa and George are taken to visit the home that Mr Bull is building. Will they find out who their new neighbors are?

programme.title: Basketball
programme.desc: Daddy teaches the kids how to play basketball, and it is not long before they are good enough to take on a team.

programme.title: Babysitting
programme.desc: Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig look after Peppa and George while Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig go out for the evening. Peppa and George are too excited to sleep and Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig play games with them to tire them out.

programme.title: Ballet Lesson

programme.desc: Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.desc: Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house. Grandpa Pig has built a tree house for them.

programme.desc: The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.desc: When Greg quits his chewing habit cold turkey, his teeth grow wildly out of control. // Clover thinks she's been given a good luck charm when Harry gifts her a four-leaf clover.

programme.title: Sir Blaze and the Unicorn
programme.desc: Witness the return of Sir Blaze and Sir AJ as they embark on an epic quest to free a magical unicorn from an unpoppable bubble!

programme.title: Pups vs. The Robo-Ducky
programme.desc: Digi and Tal get stuck on top of a giant Robo-Ducky.

programme.title: Pups Save the Puppets
programme.desc: Julius and Julia get into a sticky situation.

programme.title: Pups Save the Elephant Spa / Pups Save an Underwater Otis
programme.desc: While trying to save Traveling Travis, Ryder and the pups stumble across the legendary Elephants Spa. // Uncle Otis believes he's found gold but when Sid the Pirate tries to jump on Otis's claim, Otis gets trapped in a sunken shipping container.

programme.title: Pups Save a Playful Dragon
programme.desc: Buddy, the playful dragon from one of Alex's books, gets out and the pups need to get him back.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Ferris Wheel / The Crew Builds A Farm Animal Yoga Space
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew want to give Grocer Gabriel the best beach day ever... including a ride on a brand new Ferris wheel at the boardwalk! // When Farmer Zoe's animals need some relaxation, the pups build a perfect place to practice yoga with Coach Karima.

programme.title: The Crew And Skye Build A Mountain Lodge
programme.desc: Skye visits Rubble & Crew from Adventure Bay when their construction project needs some aerial support. But when Speed Meister tries to beat the pups to finish the job, Skye, Rubble, and the rest of the crew jump into rescue mode to save the day!

programme.title: Tres Leches Trouble / Wizzle Wozzle Woo
programme.desc: Dora, Boots, and Benny have to trek through the rainforest to deliver a big, delicate tres leches cake to Benny's abuela. // Dora and the Fiesta Trio investigate a loud, strange noise that caused them to lose their instruments.

programme.title: Call Me Billiam / The Finship Trap
programme.desc: When Rayna asks William to be more responsible, he sets out to become a grownup fishy named Billiam. // When Baby discovers Hank and Goldie aren't speaking to each other, he concocts an elaborate plan to bring them back together.

programme.title: My Fair Sharkdog
programme.desc: Max and Dennis compete to decide whose 'dog' is the best.

programme.title: Shark Marks the Spot
programme.desc: Royce wants to go on a treasure hunt with Max, but Max is distracted with Sharkdog.

programme.title: The Fishers Go Fishing
programme.desc: On a fishing trip Sharkdog meets a Great White Shark and Max fears he'll lose his best friend to his wild instincts.

programme.title: Shadows
programme.desc: Peppa and George realize that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

programme.title: International Day
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: The Rainy Day Game
programme.desc: Daddy teaches Peppa and George a fun game to play while they wait inside for the rain to stop.

programme.title: Mummy Rabbit's Bump
programme.desc: Everyone is excited when Mummy Rabbit arrives with some big news-she is pregnant! Will it be one baby or twins?

programme.title: Fancy Dress Party
programme.desc: Peppa and George are having a costume party. Peppa is a fairy princess, and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to pick which of her friends is wearing the best costume.

programme.title: Tidying Up
programme.desc: Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: The Playground
programme.desc: Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppa's friends are also there. Peppa likes going on the swings but George does not because he's scared of heights, so Daddy Pig helps George go down the slide because it is too high and ends up getting stuck.

programme.title: Daddy Puts Up a Picture
programme.desc: Daddy Pig offers to put up a picture of Peppa and George on the wall while Mummy Pig is out. He accidentally cracks the wall while doing it, so Peppa and George help Daddy Pig fix the wall before Mummy Pig comes home.

programme.title: Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen
programme.desc: Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 1
programme.desc: Joe, Murr, Q, and Sal bring you their favorite moments from season one. The guys discuss their most shocking incidents, the best reactions, and reveal never before seen moments from the cutting room floor.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 09
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin learn how to get zippers unstuck with the help of Graphite Man, and find out if a lawnmower made out of a bike is hack or wack. Plus, they'll test the best hacks for brushing your teeth when you forget your toothbrush.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 10
programme.desc: Learn how to get gum out of your hair and how to survive a zombie apocalypse. Plus, welcome a broomstick to the All Star Club, find out the real way to remove permanent marker, and discover a new Hack from History: the lawnmower.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 9
programme.desc: Let freedom ring, as World's Dumbest presents "Only in America." programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin learn how to get zippers unstuck with the help of Graphite Man, and find out if a lawnmower made out of a bike is hack or wack. Plus, they'll test the best hacks for brushing your teeth when you forget your toothbrush.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 10
programme.desc: Learn how to get gum out of your hair and how to survive a zombie apocalypse. Plus, welcome a broomstick to the All Star Club, find out the real way to remove permanent marker, and discover a new Hack from History: the lawnmower.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 9
programme.desc: Let freedom ring, as World's Dumbest presents "Only in America." Featuring 20 of the most patriotic patriots in the land - from a cop's strange take on the national anthem, to a dangerous mishap with a bald eagle, and the most insane thank you to thetroops ever put on film. Plus awesome commentary from our cast of America's best comics, including Brendon Walsh, Kevin McCaffrey and Jaime Andrews.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 20
programme.desc: While Murtaugh and Trish question their trust in Riana after she gets into trouble with some new friends, Riggs finds a true family with Molly and Ben.

programme.title: Arrow S2 6
programme.desc: While Oliver tends to the Canary's wounds, he tries to get her to talk. But when they're both attacked by the League of Assassins, she confesses that she's connected.

programme.title: East New York S1 5
programme.desc: The team races to find an escaped prisoner before he finds the cop who put him away – Haywood!

programme.title: Container Wars S1 2
programme.desc: The biggest auction you've ever seen explodes when rival bidders bet huge sums of money on forfeited international shipping containers. Will the bidders go home with brand new motor vehicles and large carnival antiques, or will they lose tens of thousands of dollars on duds? Each container is a mystery just waiting to be unveiled.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 2
programme.desc: Joe, Murr, Q, and Sal bring you more of their favorite hilarity from season one. The guys relive the moments that made them cringe, crack under pressure, and reveal behind the scenes info on the surprises that came out of left field.

programme.title: Living China
programme.desc: Real life stories told from the personal perspective. Moving, dramatic, sorrows and joys, expressed emphatically and expressed quietly. Watch closely to see and understand the real China as it is lived.

programme.title: Special Edition
programme.desc: Prestige Chinese documentary production, tackling serious subjects with the best cinematography, editing, and all round production values with a unique Chinese perspective.

programme.title: Journeys and Discoveries
programme.desc: A documentary series showcasing the history of China and its people.

programme.title: History in the Frame
programme.desc: A documentary series featuring historical and archaeological exploration.

programme.title: Best Eats
programme.desc: Food connects people! A feast for the eyes that spotlights the cuisines of China in a way that’s bound to set the mouths of the whole globe watering!

programme.title: Youthful China
programme.desc: The youth of a country is the future of that country. A series of documentaries focusing on the younger generation of China in which you get to see what they are achieving and what makes them tick!

programme.title: Pixel Collage
programme.desc: A well-crafted collage of selected short documentaries telling stories about all aspects of China! People, technology, culture, and wildlife, all are showcased in Internet-friendly form.

programme.title: Today’s Top Pick
programme.desc: Documentaries in this slot are rebroadcasts of our most-viewed and most popular stories of the season. They feature important social, economic, environmental or other policy-driven issues, affecting lives nationwide or simply in one small village. A broad selection of top productions by Chinese top documentary producers.

programme.title: Humanities and Geography
programme.desc: A strand devoted to the nature and wildlife of China, the people who lived alongside them, and the great and diverse landscapes with which they all contend.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes focus on the process of planning, setting up, and running a small business. These episodes also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the characteristics and needs of animals and plants and how they grow and the physical properties and movement of objects. These also talk about the different types of weather and changes that occur in the environment, the concepts of size, length, weight, time, and money, and the sense of quantity and numeral relations.

programme.title: Grade 1 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng mga pabula, tugma, tula, balita, at kuwento. Pinakikita rin dito ang tamang paggamit ng malalaki at maliliit na titik, mga pangngalan, at tamang pagbasa ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes discuss time and non-standard units of length, mass and capacity. These episodes also talk about pictographs without scales and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 1 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about action words and describing words. These episodes also teach about sorting and classifying words and following directions.

programme.title: Grade 1 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang konsepto ng distansya sa paglalarawan ng sariling kapaligirang ginagalawan tulad ng tahanan at paaralan at ng kahalagahan ng pagpapanatili at pangangalaga nito.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang tungkol sa pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, at pagbabasa ng teksto. Tinatalakay din dito ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area using square-tile units. These also deepen the understanding about pictographs without and with scales.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about pronouns and prepositions. These episodes also show how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Palipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tatalakayin ang pagpapahalaga sa kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang pagsusulat ng mga kuwento at pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach about conversion of time, linear, mass and capacity measures and area of square and rectangle. These episodes also talk about bar graphs and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes are about adjectives, adverbs, maps and graphs. These episodes also show how to read words and restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Grade 5 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagbibigay ng mga mahalagang pangyayari, paksa, at opinyon tungkol sa napakinggan o nabasang teksto. Matutuhan din dito ang wastong pagbaybay sa mga salita at paglalarawan ng tagpuan at tauhan.

programme.title: Grade 5 Math
programme.desc: These episodes are about area, volume, and temperature. These episodes also explain line graphs and experimental probability.

programme.title: Grade 5 English
programme.desc: These episodes focus on analyzing visual and multimedia elements and writing paragraphs and articles.

programme.title: Grade 5 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ay pag-uusapan ang bahaging ginampanan ng kolonyalismong Espanyol at pandaigdigang koteksto ng reporma sa pag- usbong ng kamalayang pambansa patungo sa pagkabuo ng Pilipinas bilang isang nasyon.

programme.title: Grade 5 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain how weathering and soil erosion shape the Earth’s surface and affect living things and the environment. These episodes also discuss about weather disturbances and their effects, the phases of the Moon and the beliefs and practices, associated with it, and the constellations and the information derived from their location in the sky.

programme.title: Grade 7 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito susuriin ang iba't ibang mga akda ayon sa mga tauhan, kaisipan, at saloobin na nakapaloob dito. Tatalakayin din ang pagsusulat ng sariling pananaw at ideya tungkol sa napakinggan.

programme.title: Grade 7 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach the key concepts, uses, and importance of statistics, data collection/gathering and the different forms of data representation, measures of central tendency, measures of variability, and probability.

programme.title: Grade 7 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach writing and composing essays. These also feature Philippine literature and theater.

programme.title: Grade 7 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagtugon ng mga Asyano sa mga hamon ng pagbabago, pag-unlad at pagpapatuloy ng Silangan at Timog-Silangang Asya sa Transisyonal at Makabagong Panahon (ika-16 hanggang ika-20 Siglo).

programme.title: Grade 7 Science
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the relation of geographical location of the Philippines to its environment, the different phenomena that occur in the atmosphere, the relationship of the seasons and the position of the Sun in the sky, and the occurrence of eclipses.

programme.title: Grade 9 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng iba't ibang akda na may kaugnayan sa kulturang Asyano batay sa mga elemento nito. Ipapaliwanag din dito kung paano maglahad at maghambing ng mga pananaw.

programme.title: Grade 9 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the basic concepts of trigonometry.

programme.title: Grade 9 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the relevance worth of ideas, soundness of author’s reasoning, and the effectiveness of a presentation. These also explain critical issues that demand sound analysis and call for prompt actions.

programme.title: Grade 9 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa mga sektor ng ekonomiya at mga patakarang pang- ekonomiya nito sa harap ng mga hamon at pwersa tungo sa pambansang pagsulong at pag-unlad.

programme.title: Grade 9 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the projectile motion, impulse and momentum, and conservation of linear momentum, conservation of mechanical energy, the relationship among heat, work, and efficiency. These episodes also talk about generation, transmission, and distribution of electrical energy from power plants to home.

programme.title: Extracurricular
programme.desc: These episodes feature different short animations and documentaries that are related to arts and culture.

programme.title: Retour Au Pays
programme.desc: It's finally time for our three hopefuls to say farewell. The moment has come for them to set off for their new life. And for everyone, this long-awaited moment suddenly becomes solemn as they realise they are about to turn an important page in their lives.

programme.title: Terra Artistika
programme.desc: The memory of the living world, where nature is magnified and acclaimed, is masterfully portrayed in Miki Nakamura's paper artwork. Installations rich in beauty and finesse, yet never intended to make you forget that she was born in Hiroshima, Japan.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Quartier Recherché
programme.desc: Corey and Evelyne take on a real challenge with a couple from Quebec. Rémi loves the city and its restaurants; Benoît prefers nature and tranquillity. Evelyne suggests the trendy district of Limoilou, whilst Corey takes them to the peace and quiet of Charlesbourg.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre
programme.desc: In addition to the houses, apartments and lofts of various styles and prices which Cédric Wautier shows us through his many visits, this programme about homes offers legal, practical, technical, energy and aesthetic advice, without forgetting the part about the all-important DIY ''tricks''.

programme.title: Odyssées Blanches
programme.desc: 1947. The rush to the poles marked the beginning of an incredible human adventure to discover the last-remaining unknown lands. In France, Paul-E?mile Victor persuaded the government to finance expeditions to explore the Arctic and Antarctic. For the pioneers the conditions were Dantean, all in the name of science.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Télévisions editorial team.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Le Goût Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Foot Go
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux
programme.desc: With a new invention by her friend, Alix wants to help Rabbit to capture a picture of a fabulous animal that is very rarely seen in the land of the Wonderfolk.

programme.title: Le Goût Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.title: Face Aux Territoires

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Bancs Publics (Versailles Rive Droite)
programme.desc: A banner hanging from the window of a building reads: lonely man. Lucie and her intrigued colleagues investigate in the district. In the streets, in the square at lunchtime, in the corner DIY shop, people come and go. Will the lonely man emerge from the crowd?

programme.title: Fanfare
programme.desc: Jules, a 20 year-old fairground traveller, has experienced three powerful emotions and must be punished. He has the choice between either a mime or a brass band which will, for the next twelve months, appear each time he experiences one of his excessive emotions. He opts for the brass band.

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire
programme.desc: Anémone doesn't want to get back in touch with the children from her first marriage without knowing whether her disease is hereditary. Simon confronts his client Sophie who makes the most of the moment to make a dramatic revelation about his father's past.

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire
programme.desc: Olivia is disturbed by the death of a teenager who committed suicide. Vincent tells Anémone about a tragedy that happened during his childhood.

programme.title: Le Sens De La Famille
programme.desc: One morning, the Morels discover they have a serious problem: everyone has woken up in the body of another member of the family! And, whilst the kids discover the joys of having the body of an adult, the regression is much more difficult to live with for the parents...

programme.title: L'attente
programme.desc: Jeanne and Céline are at the maternity clinic for the arrival of their first child. It's Jeanne who is going to give birth. During the night, in the hospital entrance hall, Céline meets two men who, like her... are waiting.

programme.title: Atiku, Gardien Du Territoire
programme.desc: Jean-Luc Kanapé, Innu de Pessamit, leads us on the tracks of the last herds of woodland caribou in the vast Pipmuacan territory. This former hunter is committed to protecting the species, which is threatened with extinction if no changes are made.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When SpongeBob mistakes an escaped convict for his driving instructor, it's the new teacher who learns a lesson. // When Krabs sends him searching for a missing toy, SpongeBob finds himself lost... in the lost & found!

programme.desc: Patrick has a coupon for free ice cream, but he'll have to get to the store if he wants to use it! // Krabs buys Squidward's art, but to make a profit on his purchase he'll have to get the artist out of the picture!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: In an alternate reality, Bikini Bottom is inhabited entirely by robots.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show

programme.desc: When Ronnie Anne realizes that she's not up to date on all of the latest trends, she seeks help from Carlota.

programme.desc: When Brainy bosses all the Smurfs around one time too many, Jokey makes him compete for a fake award. // When they get captured by Gargamel, Papa Smurf, Willow and Vanity offer to help the sorcerer impress his mother.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: 'The Sharks' are the toughest guys in town, but their next confrontation might be too much for SpongeBob to handle. // Plankton clones SpongeBob in an effort to steal Krabs’ secret formula, but original Bob might ruin his plans.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When SpongeBob and Patrick think their homes have been sold, they move away - much to Squidward’s delight. // When fortune cookies start predicting the future, Plankton realizes he can twist them to his own evil schemes.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
